translations.translation: It is coming closer to you and closer.
Alas the woe for you, alas!
This (attitude) is worthy of you, altogether worthy;
Woe to you!
Your ruin has come close, still closer.
Woe to you! And then woe to you!
Nearer to you (is destruction) and nearer,
Nearer to thee and nearer
Nearer unto thee and nearer,
Woe to you, [O man!], yes, woe to you.
Woe Unto thee; woe!
So, woe to you! Woe to you!
Woe to thee, (O men!), yea, woe!
Woe to you [O man (disbeliever)]! And then (again) woe to you!
Near to you and nearer,
Woe to you; and woe.
Woe to you, and woe!

[75:34] [Woe be] nearer to you (there is a shift from the third [to the second] person address here; the term [awlā] is a noun of action, with the [following] lām being explicative, in other words, ‘what you are averse to is [now] near to you’) and nearer, that is because you are more deserving of it [woe] than anyone else,
The Prophet (pbuh) received him, grabbed him and shook him once or twice and then said: (Nearer unto 713 thee and nearer) this is a threat to you, Abu Jahl, it is indeed a threat.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ } معناه حُقَّ لَكَ

translations.translation: And His saying, "Most rightful to you is [whatever is] most righteous" - this means that what is most rightful to you is what is most righteous.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: بسبب فعله هذا ومباهاته: { أَوْلَىٰ } وأليق { لَكَ } وبحالك في شأنك هذا الويل والهلاك { فَأَوْلَىٰ } [القيامة: 34] لك وبحالك الويل والهلاك
